name: CL_PRL_SS
description: This table contains the SmartSet/Protocol/Pathway settings that do not change per contact for each SmartSet, Protocol, Pathway, or Dental Template.

columns.name: PROTOCOL_NAME
columns.description: The SmartSet/Protocol record name.  This is different from the display name, which is stored in CL_PRL_SS_OT.DISPLAY_NAME.
